languages.text: "Не знаю, с какой поры они завелись, но год, а то и больше, уж точно ходят. Их, конечно, ловили и жгли. Но когда у нас не жгут еретиков? Каждый месяц какого-нибудь изловят. Потому поначалу на этих, новых, внимания и не обратили. А как мятеж начался, прямо сотни их отовсюду полезли. Ходят, бормочут... и все — без глаз. Да вы и сами увидите — их тут, на шоссе, полно. Такие вот дела. И не поймешь уже, то ли мятеж у нас просто из-за налогов и бедствий, то ли и впрямь... конец света грядет".

"I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch someone every month. That's why nobody noticed the new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Wandering about, muttering away... and none of them had eyes. You'll see for yourself, there's plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if the rebellion's just because of the taxes and the disasters or... if the end of the world really is coming."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, с какой поры они завелись, но год, а то и больше, уж точно ходят. Их, конечно, ловили и жгли. Но когда у нас не жгут еретиков? Каждый месяц какого-нибудь изловят. Потому поначалу на этих, новых, внимания и не обратили. А как мятеж начался, прямо сотни их отовсюду полезли. Ходят, бормочут... и все — без глаз. Да вы и сами увидите — их тут, на шоссе, полно. Такие вот дела. И не поймешь уже, то ли мятеж у нас просто из-за налогов и бедствий, то ли и впрямь... конец света грядет".

traits.locale_text: "I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch one every month. That's why nobody noticed those new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Walking about, muttering away... and they all had no eyes. You're going to see for yourself. Plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if it's just a simple rebellion because of the taxes and the disasters or... the end of the world really is coming."

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, wann sie das erste Mal aufgetaucht sind, aber sie sind definitiv seit mindestens einem Jahr da draußen. Manche wurden natürlich geschnappt und verbrannt. Doch Ketzerverbrennungen sind keine Seltenheit. Sie schnappen jeden Monat jemanden. Darum hat eine Weile lang niemand diese Neuen bemerkt. Doch sobald die Rebellion losging, sind hunderte von ihnen aus ihren Löchern gekrochen gekommen. Sind murmelnd umhergeirrt ... und alle hatten sie keine Augen mehr. Ihr werdet es selbst sehen, auf dieser Straße gibt es viele von ihnen. Tja, so ist das. Man weiß nicht mehr, ob die Rebellion nur an den Steuern und Katastrophen liegt oder ... ob die Welt wirklich bald untergeht."
languages.original_text: "I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch someone every month. That's why nobody noticed the new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Wandering about, muttering away... and none of them had eyes. You'll see for yourself, there's plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if the rebellion's just because of the taxes and the disasters or... if the end of the world really is coming."

Doch sobald die Rebellion losging, sind hunderte von ihnen aus ihren Löchern gekrochen gekommen. Sind murmelnd umhergeirrt ... und alle hatten sie keine Augen mehr. Ihr werdet es selbst sehen, auf dieser Straße gibt es viele von ihnen. Tja, so ist das. Man weiß nicht mehr, ob die Rebellion nur an den Steuern und Katastrophen liegt oder ... ob die Welt wirklich bald untergeht."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas quand ils sont apparus, mais ils sont là depuis au moins un an. On en a capturé et brûlés certains, bien sûr, mais les bûchers d'hérétiques ne sont pas vraiment rares. Quelqu'un se fait prendre tous les mois. C'est pour ça que personne n'a remarqué ces nouveaux hérétiques pendant un certain temps. Mais dès que la révolte a commencé, des centaines d'entre eux sont sortis du bois. Ils erraient en marmonnant... et aucun d'entre eux n'avait d'yeux. Vous verrez par vous-même, il y en a des quantités sur cette route. Voilà où on en est... On ne sait plus si la révolte est due simplement aux impôts et aux catastrophes ou si la fin du monde approche vraiment. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch someone every month. That's why nobody noticed the new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Wandering about, muttering away... and none of them had eyes. You'll see for yourself, there's plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if the rebellion's just because of the taxes and the disasters or... if the end of the world really is coming."

C'est pour ça que personne n'a remarqué ces nouveaux hérétiques pendant un certain temps. Mais dès que la révolte a commencé, des centaines d'entre eux sont sortis du bois. Ils erraient en marmonnant... et aucun d'entre eux n'avait d'yeux. Vous verrez par vous-même, il y en a des quantités sur cette route. Voilà où on en est... On ne sait plus si la révolte est due simplement aux impôts et aux catastrophes ou si la fin du monde approche vraiment. »

languages.text: “我不知道那群人是什么时候开始冒出来的，但肯定至少已经有一年了。当然，其中一部分人被抓住烧死了，但烧死异端分子不是什么稀罕事儿，卫兵每个月都能抓住一部分异端分子。所以很长一段时间里，根本没人注意到那些新出现的异端分子。但叛乱刚刚爆发，就有成百上千个那样的异端分子冒了出来。他们四处游荡，喃喃自语……而且都是瞎子。过一会儿，你就能亲眼看到那些人了，这一路上会有很多那样的人。这边的情况就是这样，没人能弄清楚这场叛乱究竟是由于税收，由于灾难，还是因为……世界末日真的要来了。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch someone every month. That's why nobody noticed the new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Wandering about, muttering away... and none of them had eyes. You'll see for yourself, there's plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if the rebellion's just because of the taxes and the disasters or... if the end of the world really is coming."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道那群人是什么时候开始冒出来的，但肯定至少已经有一年了。当然，其中一部分人被抓住烧死了，但烧死异端分子不是什么稀罕事儿，卫兵每个月都能抓住一部分异端分子。所以很长一段时间里，根本没人注意到那些新出现的异端分子。但叛乱刚刚爆发，就有成百上千个那样的异端分子冒了出来。他们四处游荡，喃喃自语……而且都是瞎子。过一会儿，你就能亲眼看到那些人了，这一路上会有很多那样的人。这边的情况就是这样，没人能弄清楚这场叛乱究竟是由于税收，由于灾难，还是因为……世界末日真的要来了。”

languages.text: 「いつから現れ始めたのかは分かりませんが、確かに少なくともここ一年は出没していました。もちろん、捕まって焼かれた者もいます。しかし、異端者の焼き討ちは、それほど珍しいことではありません。毎月誰かを捕まえては焼いています。ですから、誰も新たな異端者たちにしばらくは気づかなかったんでしょう。反乱が始まると、奴らは何百人も現れた。彼らはさまよい歩き、つぶやいていた…そして、その誰しもが目を持っていなかったんです。見ればわかります。この街道には奴らが多くいますので。とにかく、そういうことです。もう誰も、反乱が単に税金や災害のせいなのか、それとも…本当に世界の終わりが迫っているのかを区別できなくなりました」
languages.original_text: "I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch someone every month. That's why nobody noticed the new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Wandering about, muttering away... and none of them had eyes. You'll see for yourself, there's plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if the rebellion's just because of the taxes and the disasters or... if the end of the world really is coming."

languages.text: «No sé cuándo aparecieron por primera vez, pero desde luego llevan ahí al menos un año. Algunos fueron capturados y quemados, por supuesto. Pero las hogueras de herejes no son precisamente raras. Pillan a alguien cada mes. Por eso nadie se fijó en los nuevos durante un tiempo. Pero en cuanto empezó la rebelión, salieron cientos de ellos de la nada. Deambulando, murmurando... y ninguno de ellos tenía ojos. Lo verá con sus propios ojos, hay muchos en esta autopista. Y ya está. Ya no se sabe si la rebelión es solo por los impuestos y los desastres o... realmente se acerca el fin del mundo».
languages.original_text: "I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch someone every month. That's why nobody noticed the new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Wandering about, muttering away... and none of them had eyes. You'll see for yourself, there's plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if the rebellion's just because of the taxes and the disasters or... if the end of the world really is coming."

Pero en cuanto empezó la rebelión, salieron cientos de ellos de la nada. Deambulando, murmurando... y ninguno de ellos tenía ojos. Lo verá con sus propios ojos, hay muchos en esta autopista. Y ya está. Ya no se sabe si la rebelión es solo por los impuestos y los desastres o... realmente se acerca el fin del mundo».

languages.text: "İlk ne zaman ortaya çıktılar bilmesem de en az bir yıldır buradalar, ondan eminim. Kimi yakalanıp yakıldı tabii ama kâfir yakmak az görülür şey değil. Her ay biri paçayı kaptırır. Bu yüzden bir süre kimse bu yenileri fark etmedi ama isyan başlar başlamaz yüzlercesi saklandığı delikten çıktı. Etrafta dolaşıyor, mırıldanıyorlardı ve... Hiçbirinin gözü yoktu. Kendiniz de görürsünüz zaten, bu ana yolda sık rastlanırlar. İşte öyle. İsyan, sadece vergiler ve afetler yüzünden mi çıktı yoksa... Dünyanın gerçekten sonu mu geliyor, artık anlaması imkânsız."
languages.original_text: "I don't know when they first began to appear but they've definitely been out there for at least a year. Some got caught and burned, of course. But heretic burnings aren't exactly rare. They catch someone every month. That's why nobody noticed the new ones for a while. But as soon as the rebellion started, there were hundreds of them coming out of the woodwork. Wandering about, muttering away... and none of them had eyes. You'll see for yourself, there's plenty of them on this highway. So that's that. You can't tell anymore if the rebellion's just because of the taxes and the disasters or... if the end of the world really is coming."

Dünyanın gerçekten sonu mu geliyor, artık anlaması imkânsız."
